meanings.definition: A painting, drawing, photograph, or engraving of a person.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a beautiful portrait of the queen.
meanings.sent2: I hung a family portrait on the living room wall.
meanings.sent3: The portrait seemed to wink at me from the frame.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a portrait of pure joy.
meanings.sent5: The portrait captured every detail of his face perfectly.

meanings.definition: A verbal description or representation of a person.
meanings.sent1: She painted a vivid portrait of her best friend with words.
meanings.sent2: The author's portrait of the protagonist was incredibly detailed.
meanings.sent3: His exaggerated portrait of his teacher made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her words painted a portrait of a magical world.
meanings.sent5: The poet's portrait of love was both moving and powerful.
